channel.title: Black Mesa Gameplay Portuguese/Brazilian
channel.description:
Hi there people. I am a small channel that have started like one month ago a gameplay of black mesa. I dont put eps all days but i put them whenever i can(1 or 2 times a week). I am sorry that my videos are in portuguese/brazilian :frowning: but i think that "my people" xD need some gameplay in they language so i made one :slight_smile: In case that you want to see then i will put here my channel, the last episode and the playlist. Thank for you time :slight_smile:
Channel:[url='https://www.youtube.com/TheGarrilha']https://www.youtube.com/TheGarrilha[/url]
Last ep: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4SpvklhGWF4']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4SpvklhGWF4[/url]
Playlist: [url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?annotation_id=annotation_17468&feature=iv&list=PLED26A0103F3DA6B4&src_vid=4SpvklhGWF4']https://www.youtube.com/playlist?annotation_id=annotation_17468&feature=iv&list=PLED26A0103F3DA6B4&src_vid=4SpvklhGWF4[/url]
Cya

item.title: Black Mesa Gameplay Portuguese/Brazilian

item.description:
Hi there people. I am a small channel that have started like one month ago a gameplay of black mesa. I dont put eps all days but i put them whenever i can(1 or 2 times a week).
I am sorry that my videos are in portuguese/brazilian but i think that “my people” xD need some gameplay in they language so i made one
In case that you want to see then i will put here my channel, the last episode and the playlist.
Thank for you time
